item.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Leak Reveals Upcoming Booster Pack: Triumphant Light
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/pokemon-tcg-pocket-leak-triumphant-light/

A new Pokemon TCG Pocket leak has revealed the upcoming booster pack Triumphant Light, which will feature the Legendary Pokemon Arceus. 

Coming from reliable Pokemon TCG Pocket leaks source CentroLeaks, their new post on X reveals information on the upcoming pack, Triumphant Light. The post features a video that was “uploaded early to Pokémon’s TikTok”, where we see new Eevee, Magnemite, and Goldbat cards coming out of the new pack. At the end of the video, an Arceus Ex card is showcased, and the Legendary Pokemon’s battle skills are revealed, too. 

Underneath the new post, CentroLeaks has commented that the TCG Pocket’s Triumphant Light set is “confirmed” and will be released “this week.” This information aligns with the source’s previous leak, which said the next themed booster pack (A2a) will be released on February 28, 2025, which arrives this Friday.

As per TCG Pocket’s Triumphant Light leak, the Arceus EX card will feature two abilities: Fabled Luster and Ultimate Force. Fabled Luster makes Arceus immune to any Special Conditions and doesn’t cost anything. Ultimate Force, on the other hand, inflicts 70+ base damage and 20 more points for each benched Pokemon. Players need three energy points to use the Ultimate Force and two to Retreat with Arceus Ex. 

In other news, Pokemon TCG Pocket card listings were recently spotted on eBay. Also, the game recently gave away free trade tokens after the community’s feedback on the restriction of the feature. What are your thoughts on Pokemon TCG Pocket’s Triumphant Light booster pack? Let us know in the comments or on our community forum!

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Warner Bros. Games cancelling Wonder Woman and shutting down multiple studios. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Is Atomfall Coming To Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/is-atomfall-coming-to-xbox-game-pass/

Rebellion’s 2025 has Atomfall as a headline maker. The survival title shows a new side of England, and Game Pass subscribers—and everyone else—could benefit from a unique history lesson if an agreement is in place between the two companies.

There are genres and tropes it’s hard to get bored of. A dystopian world operating on an alternate timeline is fascinating. Atomic Heart showed us a terrifying look into an alternate-history Soviet Union. Whereas Wolfenstein’s Nazi-dominated world is also an eye-opening prospect. But Fallout is arguably where the focus usually falls.

Bethesda’s post-apocalyptic franchise looks at different areas of America in a world where nuclear war devastated the world. Atomfall doesn’t focus on nuclear devastation but more on radioactive consequences. The concept alone deserves attention, so let’s see if Game Pass is happy to risk it for a radioactive biscuit.

Can You Play Atomfall on Xbox Game Pass?

The good news is Atomfall’s release day also coincides with a day-one debut on Game Pass—Xbox’s subscription service.

Microsoft users must apply their radiation suits, arm themself, and prepare for an unpleasant trip to the Lake District. Thankfully, the Lake District is a lovely area of the UK in real life, but in Atomfall, it’s likely to be riddled with mutants and cultists.

It’s more than tolerable when it’s free though, and this is the benefit you get if you have Game Pass. Rebellion is enjoying a nice partnership with Microsoft as another 2025 release has already gotten the Game Pass treatment—Sniper Elite Resistance.

How to Play Atomfall on Xbox Game Pass

A valid Game Pass subscription, a working Xbox or PC, and a stable internet connection are all you need to play Atomfall on Xbox Game Pass.

This is how to enjoy Atomfall for free through Game Pass:

  1. Log in to your Microsoft account—or make one if you haven’t got one already.
  2. Check your Xbox Game Pass status.
  3. If you don’t have one, go to the Join Xbox Game page and subscribe.
  4. Make your way to the Xbox Store once you’ve done this.
  5. Search for Atomfall.
  6. Obtain Atomfall through Game Pass on its game page.
  7. Download it.
  8. Once this process is complete, you can play Atomfall.

If you have some spare time, watch the latest Atomfall trailer showing off the game’s features.

Atomfall is set to fill a Fallout-sized hole in the gaming calendar. With Bethesda’s next post-apocalyptic foray likely several years away, I think Atomfall should work. Do you think this could be the start of a new franchise? Leave a comment and let us know.

item.title: Is WWE 2K25 Coming To Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/is-wwe-2k25-coming-to-xbox-game-pass/

WWE 2K25 is going all out again to deliver a spectacle like nothing else. It’s the latest release in 2K’s vision of professional wrestling, and Xbox Game Pass Subscribers wonder if they can get a piece of the action.

Every new WWE 2K release feels like Wrestlemania. You have months of build-up and anticipation leading to a special payoff. Once a new game is out, attention naturally diverts toward DLC and updates, but behind the scenes, 2K is busy readying for their Wrestlemania next year. When WWE 2K24 was released, WWE 2K25 presumably became the focus.

It’s nearly time for WWE 2K25 to walk the aisle. But if you’re an Xbox Game Pass subscriber, let’s see if you can score a front-row ticket for cheap.

Can You Play WWE 2K25 on Xbox Game Pass?

It doesn’t look like WWE 2K25 is a day-one Xbox Game Pass option for subscribers as no advertising or marketing suggests this.

Xbox is proud of games coming to Game Pass and advertises them at all costs. Announcement trailers usually have the Game Pass logo stamp on them. It’s also mentioned in press releases and news articles.

WWE 2K25 has had countless trailers and press releases to this point. However, there’s no indication of WWE 2K25 being on Game Pass. Another tried and tested insight into a game’s Game Pass status is Microsoft’s Xbox Store.

If you go to the WWE 2K25 game page, you’ll find no mention of playing the title through Game Pass. Instead, it’s a case of paying full price digitally or physically or finding yourself a tasty bargain.

Will WWE 2K25 Come to Xbox Game Pass?

The chances of WWE 2K25 coming to Xbox Game Pass are very low—borderline not happening.

PGA Tour 2K25 is another 2K sports title released within a month of WWE 2K25. That’s also not coming to Game Pass, and 2K sports titles generally don’t. They don’t even come to Game Pass a year or two after release.

If you’re desperate to step into the squared circle and engage in graps, you must buy WWE 2K25 outright.

Should 2K and Microsoft tighten up their partnership stronger than a sleeper hold and deliver 2K sports titles on Game Pass? Or are you not bothered and are committed to buying each new WWE 2K title anyway?

For more WWE 2K25 news and content, check out the complete WWE 2K25 roster and ratings and all Showcase Mode matches.
